name: Obi's Christmas Adventure
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 37 jam. It is not finished, as the jam was right before final exams, so I didn't have time to make it better. Some features still needed:

- platforms: should only be solid from above; also different platforms like breakable ones, moving ones, etc

- procedurally generated random platforms

- powerups: boosts, etc.

- enemies
